original_text: And thou wentest to the king with ointment, and didst increase thy perfumes, and didst send thy messengers far off, and didst debase thyself even unto hell.
korean_text: 네가 기름을 가지고 몰렉에게 나아가되 향품을 더하였으며 네가 또 사신을 먼 곳에 보내고 스올에까지 내려가게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: And thou wentest to king with ointment
and didst send thy messengers far off
and didst debase thyself even unto hell
